creator: avm3@cdc.gov
text:
Everytime the command:

  ant main

is run, the conversion from JSP to XML is done.
The conversion prints out each file that is processed.
This is burdensome and slow when the files have not been
touched.

Would like to see:
  1. only displaye files that have been converted (not
     files that have been previously converted.
  2. Display the total number of files converted

Created attachment 1988
better printing during conversion process
creator: avm3@cdc.gov

text:
I've just added a patch which addresses the issues in this
report.  Note the following changes:

1. Only files that have been converted are displayed
   (speeds up build time on my local system)
2. Show number of files processed (and ignored)
3. Created a new constructor in FilesLister that takes
   in an "ignore" extension so that the filtering function
   could filter out files with extensions of the form:
       ignore + "." + extension
creator: avm3@cdc.gov
